title: MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage | Awesome Arcade Hamster Home (White) | 18.11 x 11.61 x 21.26 Inch
descriptions:
Introducing the MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage - Awesome Arcade Hamster Home in a sleek white design! This spacious and fun-filled habitat measures 18.11 x 11.61 x 21.26 inches and weighs a mere 6.1 lbs, making it easy to move and clean.

Your furry friend will love the multi-level play space, complete with an exercise wheel, water bottle, food bowl, nesting nook, and interior play tubes. The deep base is perfect for adding bedding, and the top door access allows for easy interaction with your pet.

The MidWest Hamster Cage features a removable upper cover, modular design, and standard play tube compatibility, making it easy to customize and expand your pet's home. No tools are required for assembly, and it's backed by a 1-year manufacturer's warranty for added peace of mind.

Give your hamster the ultimate playground and home with the MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage - Awesome Arcade Hamster Home in white. Order yours today!
